reviewText: This video is a fun way to expand your sign language skills.  My children love it and I (thankfully) do to.
Best, best, best video ever!!!  I have been showing this to my daycare for 20 years.  I only wish he had made another.
I used this video when homeschooling my sons.  The songs are terrific and make the signs easy to remember.  I passed it along to my sister who uses ASL in her volunteer work at church.
We've had this video for several years and it is still fun to us. The signing is easy to learn and do with the signer and the songs are funny and a couple are very pretty and nicely signed.
This is absolutely wonderful! The songs are catchy and fun and it is entertaining for audiences of all ages ~ I only wish it was available in DVD format.
My famiy loves this movie. We found it at the library and then one day we couldn't find it. Then i found it on here! It is fun and catchy!

Children of all ages love this video. The repetition and teaching of the repeating words/phrases have the children soon joining in and not only singing along but signing as well. Ken Lonnquist has a keen ear and sensitivity to topics that interest children everywhere. The use of singers from all backgrounds as well as different instruments engages the viewer as well. I highly recommend this one particularly for ages 7-10.
